00048 enum eMessageKind
00049 {

00109 //XXX note: sizeof(cMessage) could be made a little smaller: the fields created, frommod, fromgate are rarely used by models (note: sendtime and tstamp *do* get used in practice)
00110 class SIM_API cMessage : public cOwnedObject
00111 {
00112     friend class cMessageHeap;
00113 
00114   private:
00115     // note: fields are in an order that maximizes packing (minimizes sizeof(cMessage))
00116     short msgkind;             // message kind -- 0>= user-defined meaning, <0 reserved
00117     short prior;               // priority -- used for scheduling msgs with equal times
00118     short srcprocid;           // reserved for use by parallel execution: id of source partition
00119     cArray *parlistp;          // ptr to list of parameters
00120     cObject *ctrlp;            // ptr to "control info"
00121     void *contextptr;          // a stored pointer -- user-defined meaning, used with self-messages
00122 
00123     int frommod, fromgate;     // source module and gate IDs -- set internally
00124     int tomod, togate;         // dest. module and gate IDs -- set internally
00125     simtime_t created;         // creation time -- set be constructor
00126     simtime_t sent,delivd;     // time of sending & delivery -- set internally
00127     simtime_t tstamp;          // time stamp -- user-defined meaning
00128 
00129     int heapindex;             // used by cMessageHeap (-1 if not on heap; all other values, including negative ones, means "on the heap")
00130     unsigned long insertordr;  // used by cMessageHeap
00131 
00132     eventnumber_t prev_event_num; // event number of the last time envir was notified about this message (e.g. creating/cloning/sending/scheduling/deleting this message)
00133 
00134     long msgid;                // a unique message identifier assigned upon message creation
00135     long msgtreeid;            // a message identifier that is inherited by dup, if non dupped it is msgid
00136     static long next_id;       // the next unique message identifier to be assigned upon message creation
00137 
00138     // global variables for statistics
00139     static long total_msgs;
00140     static long live_msgs;
00141 
00142   private:
00143     // internal: create parlist
00144     void _createparlist();
00145 
00146     void copy(const cMessage& msg);
00147 
00148   public:
00149     // internal: returns the event number which scheduled this event, or the event in which
00150     // this message was last delivered to a module. Stored for recording into the event log file.
00151     eventnumber_t getPreviousEventNumber() const {return prev_event_num;}
00152 
00153     // internal: sets previousEventNumber.
00154     void setPreviousEventNumber(eventnumber_t num) {prev_event_num = num;}
00155 
00156     // internal: used by cMessageHeap.
00157     unsigned long getInsertOrder() const {return insertordr;}
00158 
00159     // internal: called by the simulation kernel as part of the send(),
00160     // scheduleAt() calls to set the values returned by the
00161     // getSenderModuleId(), getSenderGate(), getSendingTime() methods.
00162     void setSentFrom(cModule *module, int gateId, simtime_t_cref t);
00163 
00164     // internal: called by the simulation kernel as part of processing
00165     // the send(), scheduleAt() calls to set the values returned
00166     // by the getArrivalModuleId(), getArrivalGate() methods.
00167     void setArrival(cModule *module, int gateId);
00168 
00169     // internal: called by the simulation kernel as part of processing
00170     // the send(), scheduleAt() calls to set the values returned
00171     // by the getArrivalModuleId(), getArrivalGate(), getArrivalTime() methods.
00172     void setArrival(cModule *module, int gate, simtime_t_cref t);
00173 
00174     // internal: called by the simulation kernel to set the value returned
00175     // by the getArrivalTime() method
00176     void setArrivalTime(simtime_t t);
00177 
00178     // internal: used by the parallel simulation kernel.
00179     void setSrcProcId(int procId) {srcprocid = (short)procId;}
00180 
00181     // internal: used by the parallel simulation kernel.
00182     int getSrcProcId() const {return srcprocid;}
00183 
00184   public:
00187 
00191     cMessage(const cMessage& msg);
00192 
00196     explicit cMessage(const char *name=NULL, short kind=0);
00197 
00201     virtual ~cMessage();
00202 
00209     cMessage& operator=(const cMessage& msg);
00211 
00216     virtual bool isPacket() const {return false;}
00217 
00220 
00227     virtual cMessage *dup() const  {return new cMessage(*this);}
00228 
00233     virtual std::string info() const;
00234 
00239     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00240 
00245     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00246 
00252     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00253 
00259     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00261 
00264 
00270     void setKind(short k)  {msgkind=k;}
00271 
00277     void setSchedulingPriority(short p)  {prior=p;}
00278 
00282     void setTimestamp() {tstamp=simulation.getSimTime();}
00283 
00287     void setTimestamp(simtime_t t) {tstamp=t;}
00288 
00297     void setContextPointer(void *p) {contextptr=p;}
00298 
00314     void setControlInfo(cObject *p);
00315 
00321     cObject *removeControlInfo();
00322 
00326     short getKind() const  {return msgkind;}
00327 
00331     short getSchedulingPriority() const  {return prior;}
00332 
00336     simtime_t_cref getTimestamp() const {return tstamp;}
00337 
00341     void *getContextPointer() const {return contextptr;}
00342 
00346     cObject *getControlInfo() const {return ctrlp;}
00348 
00351 
00365     virtual cArray& getParList()  {if (!parlistp) _createparlist(); return *parlistp;}
00366 
00377     virtual cMsgPar& addPar(const char *s)  {cMsgPar *p=new cMsgPar(s);getParList().add(p);return *p;}
00378 
00388     virtual cMsgPar& addPar(cMsgPar *p)  {getParList().add(p); return *p;}
00389 
00393     _OPPDEPRECATED cMsgPar& addPar(cMsgPar& p)  {return addPar(&p);}
00394 
00406     virtual cMsgPar& par(int n);
00407 
00420     virtual cMsgPar& par(const char *s);
00421 
00432     virtual int findPar(const char *s) const;
00433 
00444     virtual bool hasPar(const char *s) const {return findPar(s)>=0;}
00445 
00455     virtual cObject *addObject(cObject *p)  {getParList().add(p); return p;}
00456 
00467     virtual cObject *getObject(const char *s)  {return getParList().get(s);}
00468 
00478     virtual bool hasObject(const char *s)  {return !parlistp ? false : parlistp->find(s)>=0;}
00479 
00490     virtual cObject *removeObject(const char *s)  {return getParList().remove(s);}
00491 
00502     virtual cObject *removeObject(cObject *p)  {return getParList().remove(p);}
00504 
00507 
00511     bool isSelfMessage() const {return togate==-1;}
00512 
00516     bool isScheduled() const {return heapindex!=-1;}
00517 
00523     cModule *getSenderModule() const {return simulation.getModule(frommod);}
00524 
00530     cGate *getSenderGate() const;
00531 
00537     cModule *getArrivalModule() const {return simulation.getModule(tomod);}
00538 
00544     cGate *getArrivalGate() const;
00545 
00552     int getSenderModuleId() const {return frommod;}
00553 
00561     int getSenderGateId() const   {return fromgate;}
00562 
00569     int getArrivalModuleId() const {return tomod;}
00570 
00578     int getArrivalGateId() const  {return togate;}
00579 
00585     simtime_t_cref getCreationTime() const {return created;}
00586 
00591     simtime_t_cref getSendingTime()  const {return sent;}
00592 
00607     simtime_t_cref getArrivalTime()  const {return delivd;}
00608 
00612     bool arrivedOn(int gateId) const {return gateId==togate;}
00613 
00619     bool arrivedOn(const char *gatename) const;
00620 
00625     bool arrivedOn(const char *gatename, int gateindex) const;
00626 
00630     long getId() const {return msgid;}
00631 
00636     long getTreeId() const {return msgtreeid;}
00638 
00641 
00647     virtual const char *getDisplayString() const;
00649 
00660     static long getTotalMessageCount() {return total_msgs;}
00661 
00669     static long getLiveMessageCount() {return live_msgs;}
00670 
00674     static void resetMessageCounters()  {total_msgs=live_msgs=0;}
00676 };

00706 class SIM_API cPacket : public cMessage
00707 {
00708   private:
00709     enum {
00710         FL_ISRECEPTIONSTART = 4,
00711         FL_BITERROR = 8,
00712     };
00713     int64 len;            // length of the packet in bits -- used for bit error and transmission delay modeling
00714     simtime_t duration;   // transmission duration on last channel with datarate
00715     cPacket *encapmsg;    // ptr to the encapsulated message
00716     unsigned short sharecount; // num of messages MINUS ONE that have this message encapsulated.
00717                                // 0: not shared (not encapsulated or encapsulated in one message);
00718                                // 1: shared once (shared among two messages);
00719                                // 2: shared twice (shared among three messages); etc.
00720                                // on reaching max sharecount a new packet gets created
00721 
00722   private:
00723     void copy(const cPacket& packet);
00724 
00725   public:
00726     // internal: sets the message duration; called by channel objects and sendDirect
00727     void setDuration(simtime_t d) {duration = d;}
00728 
00729     // internal: sets the isReceptionStart() flag
00730     void setReceptionStart(bool b) {setFlag(FL_ISRECEPTIONSTART, b);}
00731 
00732     // internal convenience method: returns the getId() of the innermost encapsulated message,
00733     // or itself if there is no encapsulated message
00734     long getEncapsulationId() const;
00735 
00736     // internal convenience method: returns getTreeId() of the innermost encapsulated message,
00737     // or itself if there is no encapsulated message
00738     long getEncapsulationTreeId() const;
00739 
00740     // internal: if encapmsg is shared (sharecount>0), creates a private copy for this packet,
00741     // and in any case it sets encapmsg's owner to be this object. This method
00742     // has to be called before any operation on encapmsg, to prevent trouble
00743     // that may arise from accessing shared message instances. E.g. without calling
00744     // _detachEncapMsg(), encapmsg's ownerp is unpredictable (may be any previous owner,
00745     // possibly not even existing any more) which makes even a call to its getFullPath()
00746     // method dangerous.
00747     void _detachEncapMsg();
00748 
00749     // internal: delete encapmsg, paying attention to its sharecount (assumes encapmsg!=NULL)
00750     void _deleteEncapMsg();
00751 
00752     // internal: only to be used by test cases
00753     int getShareCount() const {return sharecount;}
00754 
00755   public:
00761     cPacket(const cPacket& packet);
00762 
00767     explicit cPacket(const char *name=NULL, short kind=0, int64 bitLength=0);
00768 
00772     virtual ~cPacket();
00773 
00778     cPacket& operator=(const cPacket& packet);
00780 
00783 
00788     virtual cPacket *dup() const  {return new cPacket(*this);}
00789 
00794     virtual std::string info() const;
00795 
00800     virtual std::string detailedInfo() const;
00801 
00806     virtual void forEachChild(cVisitor *v);
00807 
00813     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00814 
00820     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00821 
00825     virtual bool isPacket() const {return true;}
00827 
00835     virtual void setBitLength(int64 l);
00836 
00842     void setByteLength(int64 l)  {setBitLength(l<<3);}
00843 
00854     virtual void addBitLength(int64 delta);
00855 
00862     void addByteLength(int64 delta)  {addBitLength(delta<<3);}
00863 
00867     virtual int64 getBitLength() const  {return len;}
00868 
00873     int64 getByteLength() const  {return (len+7)>>3;}
00874 
00878     virtual void setBitError(bool e) {setFlag(FL_BITERROR,e);}
00879 
00883     virtual bool hasBitError() const {return flags&FL_BITERROR;}
00885 
00888 
00902     virtual void encapsulate(cPacket *packet);
00903 
00911     virtual cPacket *decapsulate();
00912 
00920     virtual cPacket *getEncapsulatedPacket() const;
00921 
00926     _OPPDEPRECATED cPacket *getEncapsulatedMsg() const {return getEncapsulatedPacket();}
00927 
00934     virtual bool hasEncapsulatedPacket() const;
00936 
00945     simtime_t_cref getDuration() const {return duration;}
00946 
00955     bool isReceptionStart() const {return flags & FL_ISRECEPTIONSTART;}
00957 };
